description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席，曾任香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a national leader. He is the current Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and the fourth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席
en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的副职领导人，属于国家级副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leader of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, a position at the level of Deputy National Leader.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区行政长官

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官
en: Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区政府的首长和香港特别行政区的最高代表。
description.en: The head of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and the highest representative of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: A Hong Kong political figure, former Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: A Hong Kong political figure, former Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

zh-cn: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四届行政长官选举，由梁振英以689票当选。
description.en: The fourth Chief Executive election of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, in which Leung Chun-ying was elected with 689 votes.

description.zh-cn: 香港建制派于2020年5月成立的组织。
description.en: An organization established by the pro-establishment camp in Hong Kong in May 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港商界及政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区首任行政长官。
description.en: A Hong Kong business and political figure, the first Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区行政会议

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政会议

description.zh-cn: 协助香港特别行政区行政长官决策的机构。
description.en: An organ for assisting the Chief Executive of Hong Kong in policy-making.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英之父，曾任香港警员。
description.en: Father of Leung Chun-ying, former Hong Kong police officer.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英之母。
description.en: Mother of Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英的妻子，律师。
description.en: Wife of Leung Chun-ying, a lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英的长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英的次女。
description.en: Second daughter of Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英的幼女。
description.en: Youngest daughter of Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 香港一个已解散的政治组织。
description.en: A defunct political organization in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港一个已解散的政治组织。
description.en: A defunct political organization in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港一所已停办的小学。
description.en: A defunct primary school in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港西营盘的官立男子中学。
description.en: A government-run all-boys secondary school located in Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一所高等教育机构，现为西英格兰大学。
description.en: A higher education institution in the United Kingdom, now known as the University of the West of England.

description.zh-cn: 1985年成立的组织，负责征询香港各界对《香港基本法》草案的意见。
description.en: An organization established in 1985 to solicit opinions from all sectors of Hong Kong on the draft of the Hong Kong Basic Law.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区基本法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区基本法
en: Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的宪制性文件。
description.en: The constitutional document of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 一家全球性的房地产服务公司。
description.en: A global real estate services company.

description.zh-cn: 指父母皆非香港永久性居民而在香港出生的婴儿，此现象引发了社会资源分配和服务压力等争议。
description.en: Refers to infants born in Hong Kong to parents who are not permanent residents of Hong Kong, a phenomenon that has sparked controversy over the allocation of social resources and service pressures.

en: Occupy Central with Love and Peace

description.zh-cn: 一场为争取在香港实行真普选而发起的公民抗命运动。
description.en: A civil disobedience movement aimed at achieving genuine universal suffrage in Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 梁振英涉嫌收取澳洲企业款项事件

zh-cn: 梁振英涉嫌收取澳洲企业款项事件

description.zh-cn: 关于梁振英在2011年与澳洲企业UGL达成协议，分两年收取400万英镑而引发的争议。
description.en: A controversy surrounding an agreement made in 2011 between Leung Chun-ying and the Australian company UGL, in which he received £4 million over two years.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由梁振英牵头成立，旨在悬赏鼓励市民举报反修例运动中的“暴徒”。
description.en: A fund initiated by Leung Chun-ying to offer rewards for citizens to report 'rioters' in the anti-extradition bill movement.

description.zh-cn: 一场反对《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement against the proposed 2019 Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill.

description.zh-cn: 中共前香港地下党员，在其著作中称梁振英为共产党地下党员。
description.en: A former underground member of the CCP in Hong Kong, who claimed in her writings that Leung Chun-ying is an underground CCP member.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人及政治人物，曾是梁振英的支持者，后公开批评梁振英。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and political figure, formerly a supporter of Leung Chun-ying who later became a public critic.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾在2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举中与梁振英竞争。
description.en: A Hong Kong political figure who competed against Leung Chun-ying in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派政治家，在其回忆录中提到梁振英是地下共产党员。
description.en: A Hong Kong pro-democracy politician who mentioned in his memoirs that Leung Chun-ying was an underground communist party member.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派政治家，曾公开指梁振英是共产党人。
description.en: A Hong Kong pro-democracy politician who publicly stated that Leung Chun-ying is a communist.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的副省级市。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治事件，中国人民解放军对天安门广场的示威者进行武力清场。
description.en: A political event that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, where the People's Liberation Army forcibly cleared protesters from Tiananmen Square.

description.zh-cn: 由梁振英于1993年创立的测量师行。
description.en: A surveyor firm founded by Leung Chun-ying in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府与大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国政府于1984年签署的关于香港问题的联合声明。
description.en: A joint declaration signed in 1984 by the governments of the People's Republic of China and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland regarding the issue of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 一项允许中国大陆居民以个人身份访问香港和澳门的政策。
description.en: A policy allowing residents of mainland China to visit Hong Kong and Macau on an individual basis.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府
en: Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人，曾任商业电台节目主持。她在被商台解雇后表示，相信是梁振英政府打压新闻自由所致。
description.en: A Hong Kong media personality, former host at Commercial Radio. After being dismissed, she stated her belief that it was due to the Leung Chun-ying government's suppression of press freedom.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 梁振英在2017年3月13日获增选为全国政协副主席。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying was elected as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC on March 13, 2017.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 梁振英于2012年7月1日至2017年6月30日担任香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying served as the fourth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region from July 1, 2012, to June 30, 2017.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 梁振英在该次选举中以689票当选为香港第四届行政长官。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying was elected as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong with 689 votes in this election.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝签署国务院令，任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao signed the State Council order appointing Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任国务院总理期间，梁振英作为香港行政长官向其负责。
description.en: During Li Keqiang's tenure as Premier of the State Council, Leung Chun-ying, as Chief Executive of Hong Kong, was accountable to him.

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理期间，梁振英作为香港行政长官向其负责。
description.en: During Wen Jiabao's tenure as Premier of the State Council, Leung Chun-ying, as Chief Executive of Hong Kong, was accountable to him.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英接替曾荫权成为香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying succeeded Donald Tsang as the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 林郑月娥接替梁振英成为香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Carrie Lam succeeded Leung Chun-ying as the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英与董建华一同担任香港再出发大联盟的总召集人。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying serves as the Secretary General of the Hong Kong Coalition, alongside Tung Chee-hwa.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英与董建华一同担任香港再出发大联盟的总召集人。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying serves as the Secretary General of the Hong Kong Coalition, alongside Tung Chee-hwa.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区行政会议

description.zh-cn: 梁振英曾担任香港特别行政区行政会议非官守议员召集人。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying served as the Convener of the Non-official Members of the Executive Council of Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区基本法

description.zh-cn: 梁振英曾担任基本法咨询委员会秘书长，参与《中华人民共和国香港特别行政区基本法》的起草事务。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying served as the Secretary-General of the Basic Law Consultative Committee and participated in the drafting of the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英政府实施“零双非”政策，使所有公立及私立医院均停止接收非本地孕妇在香港分娩，大幅减少了双非婴儿的数量。
description.en: The Leung Chun-ying administration implemented the 'zero-shuangfei' policy, stopping all public and private hospitals from accepting non-local pregnant women for delivery in Hong Kong, which significantly reduced the number of 'shuangfei' infants.

description.zh-cn: “占领中环”运动的目标之一是争取真普选，与梁振英政府的政改方案立场对立，梁振英政府最终采取清场行动结束运动。
description.en: One of the goals of the 'Occupy Central' movement was to strive for genuine universal suffrage, which was in opposition to the political reform proposals of the Leung Chun-ying administration. His government ultimately cleared the protest sites to end the movement.

relationships.source: 梁振英涉嫌收取澳洲企业款项事件

description.zh-cn: 澳洲传媒揭发梁振英收取澳洲公司UGL约5,000万港元款项而未作申报，事件引发巨大争议，损害其声誉。
description.en: Australian media revealed that Leung Chun-ying received approximately HK$50 million from the Australian company UGL without declaration, sparking significant controversy and damaging his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英成立的803基金以巨额悬赏金鼓励市民举报反修例运动中的示威者，意图打击该运动。
description.en: The 803 Fund, established by Leung Chun-ying, offered large rewards to encourage citizens to report protesters in the anti-extradition bill movement, with the intent to suppress the movement.

description.zh-cn: 2019年反修例运动期间，梁振英牵头成立803基金。
description.en: During the 2019 anti-extradition bill movement, Leung Chun-ying took the lead in establishing the 803 Fund.

description.zh-cn: 1989年六四事件发生后，梁振英在报章刊登声明，强烈谴责中共当权者血腥屠杀中国人民。
description.en: After the 1989 Tiananmen Square massacre, Leung Chun-ying published a statement in newspapers strongly condemning the CCP authorities for the bloody massacre of the Chinese people.

description.zh-cn: 中共前香港地下党员梁慕娴在其著作《我与香港地下党》中，指称梁振英为共产党地下党员。
description.en: Leung Mo-han, a former underground CCP member in Hong Kong, alleged in her book 'My Life in the Hong Kong Underground' that Leung Chun-ying is an underground CCP member.

description.zh-cn: 已故的司徒华在他的回忆录《大江东去》中提到梁振英是地下共产党员。
description.en: The late Szeto Wah mentioned in his memoir 'The Great River Flows East' that Leung Chun-ying was an underground communist party member.

description.zh-cn: 李柱铭曾公然指梁振英是共产党人。
description.en: Martin Lee publicly stated that Leung Chun-ying is a communist.

description.zh-cn: 刘梦熊曾是梁振英的坚定支持者，后在专访中爆料指责梁振英在僭建问题上说谎，并声称梁曾承诺委任其官职，两人关系破裂。
description.en: Lew Mon-hung was once a staunch supporter of Leung Chun-ying, but later revealed in an interview that Leung had lied about the illegal structures issue and claimed Leung had promised him an official position, leading to a breakdown in their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，时任上海市委副书记的朱镕基，找梁振英协助上海进行第一次卖地。
description.en: In 1988, Zhu Rongji, then Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, sought Leung Chun-ying's assistance for Shanghai's first land sale.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英协助上海进行第一次卖地，建议公开招标并与上海市官员共同起草标书。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying assisted Shanghai with its first land sale, suggesting public tender and co-drafting the tender documents with Shanghai officials.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英曾义务帮助深圳进行招标卖地。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying voluntarily assisted Shenzhen with its land sale tenders.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英测量师行于1999年与新加坡及英国两家公司合并，组成戴德梁行。
description.en: In 1999, C.Y. Leung & Co. merged with two companies from Singapore and the UK to form DTZ.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英提出解决主权移交后界限街以北土地续约问题的建议，后来成为《中英联合声明》附件三的主要内容。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying proposed a solution for the land lease extension issue north of Boundary Street after the handover, which later became the main content of Annex III of the Sino-British Joint Declaration.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，梁振英代表时任行政长官董建华与中央人民政府商讨自由行政策。
description.en: In 2003, on behalf of then-Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa, Leung Chun-ying negotiated the Individual Visit Scheme policy with the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英与唐英年是2012年香港行政长官选举的主要竞争对手，选举期间两人互相攻击。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying and Henry Tang were the main rivals in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, during which they attacked each other.

description.zh-cn: 商业电台节目主持李慧玲被解雇后，表示“百分百感觉”是梁振英政府打压新闻言论自由，并提及有官员透露她为梁最憎恨的人。
description.en: After being dismissed by Commercial Radio, host Li Wei-ling stated she '100% felt' it was suppression of press freedom by the Leung Chun-ying government, and mentioned an official had revealed she was the person Leung hated the most.
